creditline: Gift of Henry and Judith Pillsbury in Honor of P. W. Pillsbury
markings: Blind stamp of the ministry of the interior (Lugt 1816d)
text: Meryon experimented by printing on different supports, in this case on a very thin greenish-gray paper.  In comparison to the example printed on cream paper also in the exhibition (P.3,012), this piece has a very different mood and effect.
title: The Church of Saint-Etienne-du-Mont
